summary: A palantír is a crystal ball from J.R.R. Tolkien's "The Lord of the Rings," made by ancient elves. These powerful tools let users see events far away or in the past. Only a few still exist by the story's time. Important characters like Sauron, Saruman, and Aragorn use them. However, palantírs can be misleading, as users might only see what they want to see. Some experts say using these stones instead of trusting fate can lead to trouble.
title: Palantír
